participant_1.background:
I look through my old trophy case to remind myself of a simpler time.
i m almost finished with my degree.
I'm not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that.
I am quite short, only five foot four.
My hobbies include coloring my hair bright colors and trying new coffee shops with my husband.

participant_2.background:
I live in a small town in the Midwest, USA.
I wear comfortable clothes that are easy to move around in
I like to eat apples because they are healthy and sweet.
my dad was a cop until he was killed.
My daily routine consists of applying for jobs and working on my own stories in the hopes that one day I'll be published.

content.text: Not much, just working on my stories. Trying to get published someday.
That's awesome! What kind of stories do you write?
Mostly fantasy and sci-fi, but I've dabbled in other genres.
That sounds really cool! I love to read, I'd love to read some of your work sometime.
Thanks! I'd love to share it with you. I'm always looking for feedback.
That's a tough question... I love so many books. I guess I'd have to say The Lord of the Rings.
That's a classic! I love that series too.
It's so good! What's your favorite book?
I'm not sure I could pick just one. I love Harry Potter, The Hunger Games, and The Percy Jackson series.
Those are all great books! I've read all of them too.
Me too! I love the fantasy genre.
Me too! It's so fun to escape into another world.
I know right? It's like you can leave all your problems behind for a while.
Exactly! That's why I love reading so much.
Me too. It's one of my favorite things to do.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who loves to read
